name: Songrider
description:
Hello everyone!

This is a small game I made for a test to work at a mobile game company, in it I prototyped some sort of currency and economics, and a hypercasual gameplay loop.

I love the vaporwave aesthetics and sound, so I decided to make a game in which you can just enjoy both.

In this game, you're a street racer with a powerful car, just swerve left and right to move and hit all small cars to get bonus coins, otherwise, try to avoid the large trucks, since you will crash if you hit them.

It works only in landscape mode, unfortunately some shaders weren't working on the web version, so all I have is a android apk.

Disclaimer: I didn't do, nor I claim to own, any of the art in this game, nor the characters. They were all taken from the Unity Store or freepik.com

Song is Divide by Magna, from the Hotline Miami 2 soundtrack
